tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
NOTE: Some of these metrics will differ from those in the [Splunk dashboard](https://gds.splunkcloud.com/en-GB/app/gds-050-digital-Identity/account_management_frontend_clone).

This dashboard measures successful backend operations. This differs from the [Splunk dashboard](https://gds.splunkcloud.com/en-GB/app/gds-050-digital-Identity/account_management_frontend_clone), which tracks all front-end page visits (including refreshes), and will therefore show a higher count.

More details around what the metrics are measuring (which is sometimes different to what is measured in Splunk) can be found on the far right of the page.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## "Update" Operations

"Phone number updates" and "Auth app updates" track both "change" and "switch" journeys.

- "Change" journey - “Change phone number” and “Change authenticator app" on the frontend. (So changing the default MFA method to a new one of the same type).
- "Switch" journey - "Use a different default method" on the frontend. (So switching the default method to the opposite method - so SMS → new Auth App OR Auth App → new SMS).

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## "Add Backup" Operations

These track the number of each type of MFA method (SMS or Auth App at present) being added as a new backup MFA method.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## "Delete" Operations

These track the number of deleted backup MFA methods.
